cmd: curl -s -L https://downloads.mesosphere.io/java/jre-8u45-linux-x64.tar.gz -o jre1.8.0_45.tar.gz && tar -xvzf jre1.8.0_45.tar.gz && curl -s -L http://apache.mirrors.hoobly.com/drill/drill-1.9.0/apache-drill-1.9.0.tar.gz -o apache-drill-1.9.0.tar.gz && tar -xvzf apache-drill-1.9.0.tar.gz && export JAVA_HOME="`pwd`/jre1.8.0_45" && export PATH="$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH" && apache-drill-1.9.0/bin/drill-embedded
